mapper.select: SELECT ta.id, ta.spu_id, ta.sale_attr_name, ta.base_sale_attr_id, tb.id as spu_sale_attr_value_id, tb.sale_attr_value_name FROM spu_sale_attr ta INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value tb ON ta.spu_id = tb.spu_id AND ta.base_sale_attr_id = tb.base_sale_attr_id WHERE ta.spu_id = #{spuId}

SELECT sp1.id, sp1.spu_id, sp1.base_sale_attr_id, sp1.sale_attr_name, sp2.id spu_sale_attr_value_id, sp2.sale_attr_value_name, IF (sk1.sku_id IS NULL, 0, 1) isChecked FROM spu_sale_attr sp1 INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value sp2 ON sp1.base_sale_attr_id = sp2.base_sale_attr_id AND sp1.spu_id = sp2.spu_id LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value sk1 ON sk1.id = sp2.id AND sk1.sku_id = #{skuId} WHERE sp1.id = #{spuId}
